description: man seated at a table facing right looking right, holding a book open on the table; wearing cloak and ruff
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

above image in black: M. GEORGIUS VOLCARTUS Nat est Norim / bergæ Ao Ch: 1558. d. 22 April Mortu Ao 1628. d:13 Martii | in image upper right corner in black: Ætat: 70 | below image in black: Si quem Therologum quoeris doctumg prima, / Candida cui sandi dexteritasg, suit; / Aspice VOSCARTG vultum geniumg, GEORGG, / Doedala qua potuit sistere utrumg, manus. / I.V.R.   O. Sanddrart Sculp.  | on mount in pencil: 2-358
title: M. Georgius Volcartus
